body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     August 08, 2016  National Park Service Celebrates 100th Birthday  Come and join us as we celebrate the National Park’s Centennial!  The National Park Service turns 100 in August and is offering free admission Thursday, August 25th – Sunday, August 28 at all the national parks, including St. Augustine’s two National Monuments; Castillo de San Marcos and Fort Matanzas.  In addition, Castillo de San Marcos will host a special concert on August 27 by the St. Augustine Youth Chorus.
title: Castillo de San Marcos National Monument: News Releases
